title: 2016년 Blake Anthony Monakino v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Blake Anthony Monakino v. State. 판결일: 2016-10-18. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Blake Anthony MONAKINO, Appellant v. the STATE of Texas, Appellee
**판결일**: 2016-10-18
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Brown, Jennings, Keyes

## 변호인

Jessica Akins, Alan Keith Curry, Devon Anderson, for State of Texas., Melissa Martin, for Blake Anthony Mo-nakino.

## 인용

- 535 S.W.3d 559

## 판결문 요약

Order issued October 18, 2016




                                      In The

                               Court of Appeals
                                     For The

                          First District of Texas
                            ————————————
                              NO. 01-14-00361-CR
                            ———————————
                 BLAKE ANTHONY MONAKINO, Appellant
                                        V.
                       THE STATE OF TEXAS, Appellee



                    On Appeal from the 174th District Court
                            Harris County, Texas
                        Trial Court Case No. 1397016



                          ORDER OF ABATEMENT

      After appellant, Blake Anthony Monakino, pleaded guilty to the second-

degree felony offense of aggravated assault without an agreed punishment

recommendation from the State, the trial court assessed his punishment at six years’
 confinement.1 Although appellant timely filed a pro se notice of appeal, the trial

court, believing that appellant did not have the right to appeal, did not appoint

appellate counsel until several months later. In two issues, appellant argues that

(1) the trial court erroneously failed to appoint appellate counsel within the time

period for filing a motion for new trial, and (2) his trial counsel rendered

constitutionally ineffective assistance. Appellant requests that this Court abate his

appeal so he can file an out-of-time motion for...
